div.a: Póliza de Transportación de Autobús de Enlace Academy

span.a: Póliza de Transportación de Autobús de Enlace Academy

div.h1: Your Child's Potential is Our Passion

div.p: Enlace Academy fosters the character, cultivates the intellect, and ignites the imagination of her students as they become leaders who choose their own futures in high school, college, and beyond.

figure.class: sqs-block-image-figure image-block-outer-wrapper image-block-v2 design-layout-poster combination-animation-none individual-animation-none individual-text-animation-none image-position-left

div.p: We strive to touch the hearts and minds of our students, families, and community partners in order to build a strong support team.

figure.class: sqs-block-image-figure image-block-outer-wrapper image-block-v2 design-layout-poster combination-animation-none individual-animation-none individual-text-animation-none image-position-left

div.p: Our students engage in challenging and worthy tasks that push their thinking to higher levels and build problem-solving and analytical thinking skills.

figure.class: sqs-block-image-figure image-block-outer-wrapper image-block-v2 design-layout-poster combination-animation-none individual-animation-none individual-text-animation-none image-position-left

div.p: Our educators know the strengths and growth areas of all their students so they can plan effectively and invest their students in the learning process.

figure.class: sqs-block-image-figure image-block-outer-wrapper image-block-v2 design-layout-poster combination-animation-none individual-animation-none individual-text-animation-none image-position-left

div.p: We believe that every minute of every day we have with our students is a valuable chance for them to learn, whether academically, socially, or emotionally.
